content.raw: We already talked about it, so this is for the benefit of everyone else. The ros message joy format hides context inside the message. This is a generic joystick message that clearly defines what the data is (translation, rotation, buttons). A ps3joystick can make use of this joystick message by combining two of these joystick messages.
